text: La Granadera was the national anthem of the Federal Republic of Central America. The composer of the music is not known; the words were written by . == Lyrics == === Spanish original lyrics === {| cellpadding="10" |- | style="width:50%;"| |} === English translation === {| cellpadding="10" |- | style="width:50%;"| |} == References == Category:Historical national anthems Category:Federal Republic of Central America Category:1823 songs Category:North American anthems Category:1823 in Central America
title: La Granadera
